entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: WSW 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
